metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8000 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: In PoDoFo 0.9.5, there exists a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in PoDoFo::PdfTokenizer::GetNextToken() in PdfTokenizer.cpp, a related issue to CVE-2017-5886. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial-of-service or potentially execute arbitrary code via a crafted pdf file.

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
